2.Pros: I enjoy the enthusiastic, upbeat work environment! I also enjoy the opportunity to meet new people on a regular basis. I enjoy delivering customer satisfaction!
2.Cons: My specific work location is a 20 year old store with all the original equipment that breaks down constantly. This results in extended wait time and a lot of needless customer complaints as we are not able to deliver all products on a daily basis. The AC unit is also 20 years old and it fails to work properly in the summer months. This results in both customers and employees Sweating Profusely in the restaurant. Not only is this miserable for everyone concerned, it calls into question how much SWEAT is falling onto the product and customers' change as they receive it. I used to work for Mc Donalds in my teens and it was a Far Better Store with everything working properly all the time. What a disappointment to work at this location which customers routinely tell me is The Worst Mc Donalds they have ever been too!!!
